short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize your very long slack threads
short.ko: React, Typescript, Vite를 사용한 크롬 익스텐션 보일러플레이트입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The slack threads can be very long sometimes. This Chrome extension can summarize the thread in your language. Save a lot of time!
